name: Counter Ecl
author: Enrique Cerda

sections.description:
A simple counter to the web and cookie Law. Is responsive.

Features

Counter Ecl

  • A simple counter to the web
  • Use bootstrap css.
  • Responsive.
  • Customize the counter in new Menu.
  • Customize the expiry time of the cookie.
  • Multisite support
  • Panel container type, list o none.
  • Counter Types. Text, badge, label or analog.
  • Translation English, Spanish, French and German
  • Shortcode [counter_ecl] for post and page.
    For more information Plugins WordPress Infocerda
  • Format counter.
  • Fancy Counter, 3D effect.
  • Animation counter: move number, hide, fade and slide.
    To determine the duration of effect in milliseconds.
  • Separate number counter or together.
  • fix the position Top.
  • Message for the cookie law. Configure position, color, background ,messagge and effects.
    This message is optional. You can activate. The time Cookie is diferent from the Counter.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin
  2. Extract all the files.
  3. Upload the entire counter-ecl folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
*The widget is completely intuitive, beam color combinations, size and if you want to establish the initial counter.

*The expiry time of the cookie can also be set with this control when to record the visit.

*The shortcode is [counter_ecl]. There are several attributes that change shape.

the attributes: format, background, color, size, align, type, container, float, display3d, separate, animate, duration and topfix.

Example:

[counter_ecl]

[counter_ecl container=”panel” background=”green”]

[counter_ecl type=”analog” display3d=”true” color=”white” separate=”true” animate=”mov”]

For more information Plugins WordPress Infocerda

*The time Cookie for Message is diferent from the counter. It work only when accept conditions the message.

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the plugin
  2. Extract all the files.
  3. Upload the entire counter-ecl folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.5

  • Add the cookie law. Configuration in Menu Counter ECL.
  • Engine improvements cookies for Counter and Message.

1.4

  • Type counter analog is added.
  • Color and Background: White and Black is added.
  • 3D Effects is added for all counter type.
  • Animation counter is added:
    four animation:

    • none
    • move numbers
    • Hide
    • Fade
    • Slide
      To determine the duration of effect in milliseconds.
  • Separate Numbers counter o together, animation effects change.
  • We can move the starting position.

1.3

  • Shortcode [counter_ecl] for post and page.
  • Type container none is added.
  • Counter format as numerical or not.

1.2

  • Multisite support
  • Type container panel is added.
  • Text, or Badge Label: counter types is added.
  • Support for Languages.

1.1

  • Web counter is customized in the menu ECL counter in the previous version is customized in the same widget.
  • It is also possible to set the expiry time of the cookie that controls the web counter.

1.0

  • The fisrt version.
